data.name: Warface - Halloween Pack
data.detailed_description:
Halloween is creeping around the corner! And the ominous wind signals the time for ghoulishly delightful festivities.

Here's the phantom force Halloween pack offers:


  • Dread Mask — nothing strikes fear in the eyeballs of your bloody foes more than this malicious headgear.
  • Halloween Vest — fortifies your frail defense to make you less of a meatbag and more of... a payback machine.
  • Mischief H&K G36K, SPAS-12, H&K G36C and H&K SL8 — haunted weapons to match your scarecrow looks and killer instinct.
  • Mischief Army Knife — eerie living weapon with crazy bloodlust.
  • Explosive and smoke Mischief grenades — unearthly devices for summoning terror and spirits.
  • 1000 Kredits — dead man's gold.

Let the mischievous spirit possess your body and astonish your nemesis!

data.short_description: Halloween is creeping around the corner! Let the mischievous spirit possess your body and astonish your nemesis!
data.supported_languages:
English*, French*, German*, Polish*, Spanish - Spain, Simplified Chinese
*languages with full audio support

pc_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • OS: Windows 7, Windows 8, Windows 10
  • Processor: Intel/AMD Dual-Core 2.0 GHz
  • Memory: 2 GB RAM
  • Graphics: NVIDIA GeForce 8600 GT 256MB / AMD ATI Radeon X1950 256MB
  • DirectX: Version 9.0c
  • Network: Broadband Internet connection
  • Storage: 10 GB available space
  • Sound Card: DirectX Compatible Sound Card with latest drivers
pc_requirements.recommended:
Recommended:
  • OS: Windows 7, Windows 8, Windows 10
  • Processor: Intel Core2Duo E6-series / Athlon64 X2 6400+
  • Memory: 4 GB RAM
  • Graphics: NVIDIA GeForce 9600GT 512MB / AMD Radeon HD 4830 512MB
  • DirectX: Version 9.0c
  • Network: Broadband Internet connection
  • Storage: 10 GB available space
  • Sound Card: DirectX Compatible Sound Card with latest drivers
